readable.content: An Asian girl wearing a very colorful dress is carrying a plastic cup . An asian woman drinking from a plastic mug . A woman in a multi-colored dress is holding a plastic cup while gesturing with the other hand . A young woman wearing a dress makes an awkward hand sign . The woman is holding a mug , and has sunglasses on the top of her head .
